description: The default configuration of WebAPP before 0.9.9.5 has a CAPTCHA setting of "no," which makes it easier for automated programs to submit false data.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1184

description: The (1) Search, (2) Edit Profile, (3) Recommend, and (4) User Approval forms in WebAPP before 0.9.9.5 use hidden inputs, which has unknown impact and remote attack vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1185

description: WebAPP before 0.9.9.5 does not "censor" the Latest Member real name, which has unknown impact.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1186

description: WebAPP before 0.9.9.5 allows remote authenticated users, without admin privileges, to obtain sensitive information via (1) the Forum Archive feature and (2) Recent Searches.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1187

description: WebAPP before 0.9.9.5 allows remote attackers to submit Search form input that is not checked for (1) composition or (2) length, which has unknown impact, possibly related to "search form hijacking".

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1188

description: Integer overflow in the envwrite function in the Alcatel-Lucent Bell Labs Plan 9 kernel allows local users to overwrite certain memory addresses with kernel memory via a large n argument, as demonstrated by (1) modifying the iseve function to gain privileges and (2) making the devpermcheck function grant unrestricted device permissions.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1189

description: Unspecified vulnerability in the EmbeddedWB Web Browser ActiveX control allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1190

description: The Social Bookmarks (del.icio.us) plug-in 8F in Quicksilver writes usernames and passwords in plaintext to the /Library/Logs/Console/UID/Console.log file, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information by reading this file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1191

description: Thomas R. Pasawicz HyperBook Guestbook 1.30 stores sensitive information under the web root with insufficient access control, which allows remote attackers to download an admin password hash via a direct request for data/gbconfiguration.dat.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1192

description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in the Login page in OrangeHRM before 20070212 have unknown impact and attack vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1193

description: Norman SandBox Analyzer does not use the proper range for Interrupt Descriptor Table (IDT) entries, which allows local users to determine that the local machine is an emulator, or a similar environment not based on a physical Intel processor, which allows attackers to produce malware that is more difficult to analyze.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1194

description: Multiple buffer overflows in XM Easy Personal FTP Server 5.3.0 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors. NOTE: this issue might overlap CVE-2006-2225, CVE-2006-2226, or CVE-2006-5728.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1195

description: Unspecified vulnerability in Citrix Presentation Server Client for Windows before 10.0 allows remote web sites to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors, related to the implementation of ICA connectivity through proxy servers.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1196

description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Epiware before 4.7.5 have unknown impact and attack vectors, possibly related to cross-site scripting (XSS) and other unspecified issues.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1197

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in TaskFreak! before 0.5.7 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors, possibly a variant of CVE-2007-0982.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1198

description: Adobe Reader and Acrobat Trial allow remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a file:// URI in a PDF document, as demonstrated with <</URI(file:///C:/)/S/URI>>, a different issue than CVE-2007-0045.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1199

description: Buffer overflow in the bufprint function in capiutil.c in libcapi, as used in Linux kernel 2.6.9 to 2.6.20 and isdn4k-utils, allows local users to cause a denial of service (crash) and possibly gain privileges via a crafted CAPI packet.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1217

NOTE: this was originally referred to as heap-based, but it might be stack-based.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1218

description: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability in actions/del.php in Admin Phorum 3.3.1a allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the include_path parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1219

description: The Hypervisor in Microsoft Xbox 360 kernel 4532 and 4548 does not properly verify the parameters passed to the syscall dispatcher, which allows attackers with physical access to bypass code-signing requirements and execute arbitrary code.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1220

description: The Hypervisor in Microsoft Xbox 360 kernel 4532 and 4548 allows attackers with physical access to force execution of the hypervisor syscall with a certain register set, which bypasses intended code protection.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1221

description: Parallels Desktop for Mac before 20070216 implements Drag and Drop by sharing the entire host filesystem as the .psf share, which allows local users of the guest operating system to write arbitrary files to the host filesystem, and execute arbitrary code via launchd by writing a plist file to a LaunchAgents directory.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1222

description: Unspecified vulnerability in Hitachi OSAS/FT/W before 20070223 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (responder control processing halt) by sending "data unexpectedly through the port".

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1223

description: Grok Developments NetProxy 4.03 allows remote attackers to bypass URL filtering via a request that omits "http://" from the URL and specifies the destination port (:80).

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1224

description: The connection log file implementation in Grok Developments NetProxy 4.03 does not record requests that omit http:// in a URL, which might allow remote attackers to conduct unauthorized activities and avoid detection.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1225

description: McAfee VirusScan for Mac (Virex) before 7.7 patch 1 has weak permissions (0666) for /Library/Application Support/Virex/VShieldExclude.txt, which allows local users to reconfigure Virex to skip scanning of arbitrary files.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1226

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1227

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1229

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1230

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1231

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1232

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1233

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1234

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1235

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1236

NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1300

description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the IMAP service in MailEnable Enterprise and Professional Editions 2.37 and earlier allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via a long argument to the APPEND command.  NOTE: this is probably different than CVE-2006-6423.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1301

description: SQL injection vulnerability in guestbook.php in LI-Guestbook 1.1, when magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the country parameter.  NOTE: it was later reported that 1.2 is also affected.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1302

description: Directory traversal vulnerability in rb.cgi in RRDBrowse 1.6 and earlier allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the file parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1303

description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in add2.php in Sava's Guestbook 23.11.2006, when magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) name, (2) country, (3) email, (4) website, and (5) message parameters.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1304

description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in add2.php in Sava's Guestbook 23.11.2006 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) name, (2) country, (3) email, and (4) website parameters.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1305

description: Asterisk 1.4 before 1.4.1 and 1.2 before 1.2.16 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) by sending a Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) packet without a URI and SIP-version header, which results in a NULL pointer dereference.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1306

description: Unspecified vulnerability in Lenovo Intel PRO/1000 LAN adapter before Build 135400, as used on IBM Lenovo ThinkPad systems, has unknown impact and attack vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1307

description: ecma/kjs_html.cpp in KDE JavaScript (KJS), as used in Konqueror in KDE 3.5.5, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) by accessing the content of an iframe with an ftp:// URI in the src attribute, probably due to a NULL pointer dereference.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1308

description: Novell Access Management 3 SSLVPN Server allows remote authenticated users to bypass VPN restrictions by making policy.txt read-only, disconnecting, then manually modifying policy.txt.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1309

description: NETxAutomation NETxEIB OPC Server before 3.0.1300 does not properly validate OLE for Process Control (OPC) server handles, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors involving the (1) IOPCSyncIO::Read, (2) IOPCSyncIO::Write, (3) IOPCServer::AddGroup, (4) IOPCServer::RemoveGroup, (5) IOPCCommon::SetClientName, and (6) IOPCGroupStateMgt::CloneGroup functions, which allow access to arbitrary memory. NOTE: the vectors might be limited to attackers with physical access.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-1313
